biotools.summary: Deep learning with multimodal representation for pancancer prognosis prediction | Our model estimates the time-til-death for patients across 20 different cancer types using the vast amount of multimodal data that is available for cancer patients | git clone https://github.com/gevaertlab/MultimodalPrognosis | For more details, see our paper
